description:
• Do you want to be ahead of the competition?
  • Do you want to be found on the second largest search engine in the world?
  • You need to be on youtube

Youtube has more than 1 billion users â€“ some of them are YOUR potential customers and fans just waiting to connect with you.

I don't want you to miss out on this massive opportunity so have created

'The Ultimate Youtube course for Beginners'

I'm here to walk you through the step by step process of creating your new youtube channel & very first video.

LEARN HOW TO

- CREATE & OPTIMIZE A YOUTUBE CHANNEL

- FILM, EDIT AND PUBLISH PROFESSIONAL VIDEOS

And that's just the start.

You will also learn the quickest way to film and edit your first youtube video, how to create channel art for free, why you need a Google+ page, what is SEO, how to properly light your videos PLUS much more.

My aim is to get you up and running on youtube in no time - but we don't rush through anything. Each lecture is packed full of tips to help you build your brand online and create a successful youtube channel.

My name is Veena V - I have over a decade of experience working in the media industry as a presenter, producer and blogger. I've also racked up over 100,000 views on youtube and will share with you all my presenting, filming and editing tips.

This is a comprehensive and in depth course and by the end you will feel confident in front of a camera.

This course is different to any other you have taken as I'm very honest and realistic. I can't promise you millions of views but I can promise you a youtube channel that will

  • Build your brand
  • Increase revenue
  • Gain trust & loyalty from customers
  • Establish you as an authority & expert in your niche

2015 is the year of VIDEO so what are you waiting for?

YOU CAN DO IT
title: Youtube for Beginners - Learn how to film, edit & optimize
